title: Best female music artists
subtitle: Explore the most successful women in music history
description: Throughout history, numerous women have become cultural icons and symbols of female empowerment, thanks to their unique talents, distinctive voices, and memorable hits. With this story we want to explore some of the most influential and successful female musicians of all time, who have sold millions of records and inspired countless people around the world.

dynamic_elements.count_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>

 

SELECT (COUNT(?list) AS ?count)
WHERE
{
?list a owl:Thing .
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
}
dynamic_elements.count_label: Number of albums by women that sold more than 10mln

dynamic_elements.text: This is the number of famous albums that sold at least 10 million copies worldwide. In the music scene, this surely represents a measure of success and recognition for every artist.

dynamic_elements.table_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

 


SELECT DISTINCT  ?name ?picture ?birth_date ?place_of_birth ?years_active ?death_date 
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?birth_date .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?death_date .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
?person dbp:birthPlace ?place_of_birth . 
?person dbp:name ?name 
MINUS { ?person dbp:name "Whitney Houston"@en } 
?person dbo:thumbnail ?pic .
OPTIONAL {  ?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic ?person


BIND (REPLACE(str(?pic), "(\\?width=300)", "","i") AS ?picture)} 
ORDER BY ?years_active

dynamic_elements.text: With this doughnut chart we want to represent the number of awards honoring female performers and songwriters for their career and artistic achievements in the music business.

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?count
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?label .
?person dbp:awards ?what .  
FILTER (REGEX (?what, "awards", "I"))
?what dbp:nominations ?nominations .
?what dbp:wins ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC ( ?count)

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?count
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?label .
?person dbp:awards ?what .  
FILTER (REGEX (?what, "awards", "I"))
?what dbp:nominations ?count .
?what dbp:wins ?eins .
}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC (?count)

dynamic_elements.text: Another significant recognition that female artists get for their artistic production is the nomination for awards and prizes. Similarly, the following bar chart explores the number of nominations that most popular female musicians received during their career.

dynamic_elements.map_title: Place of birth of the most influential female artists
dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

 

SELECT DISTINCT  ?name ?point ?lat ?long
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?name .
?person dbo:birthPlace ?luogo .
?luogo georss:point ?point ; geo:lat ?lat ; geo:long ?long . 
}
GROUP BY ?luogo

dynamic_elements.textsearch_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?Name ?person 
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person rdfs:label ?Name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
FILTER regex(str(?Name), <<searchterm>>, 'i') 
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic ?person .
FILTER (LANG(?Name)="en")
 }

dynamic_elements.action_query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?years_active
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person dbp:name ?Name .
?person dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
 <<item>> dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic ?person
 }

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?wikipage
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person rdfs:label ?Name .   
?person dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic  <<item>>  .
FILTER (LANG(?Name)="en")
 }

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> 
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX commons: <http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?BirthDate
WHERE { 
?list a owl:Thing . 
?list ?relation dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women . 
?person a dbo:Animal ; a dbo:Person .
dbr:List_of_best-selling_albums_by_women  ?boh ?person .
?person rdfs:label ?Name .   
<<item>> dbo:birthDate ?BirthDate .
OPTIONAL { 
?person dbo:deathDate ?datam .  }
?person dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?years_active .
OPTIONAL { 
?person foaf:homepage ?sito . }
?wikipage  foaf:primaryTopic  ?person  .
FILTER (LANG(?Name)="en")
 }
